Methods

GetHamachiIp()
GetInternetInterfaces()

Gets the network interfaces used for going onto the internet. This is done by filtering for "Ethernet" and "Wi-Fi" network interfaces where "Ethernet" is returned earlier.

GetLanIp()
GetWanIpAsync()
IsLocalhost(IPAddress)

Returns true if the IP address points to the executing machine.

IsPrivate(IPAddress)

Returns true if the given IP address is reserved for private networks.
